NSS IITD App

Is getting updates on NSS events a problem?
Do you forget the time and venue of events?

NSS IIT D launches its Android Application which can be installed on your Android device (on Android 4.0 and above) and can be used for -

1. Checking the Upcoming Events.
2.You can sync the Upcoming Events with your phone's calendar and can set a reminder for the event via Add To Calendar option.
3.You can also check the regular Ongoing Volunteering Opportunities.
4.Registering for all events via the App.
5.Log on to the NSS IITD FB page , NSS IITD site and view contacts of all team members at an instant.
The Application is uploaded with instruction file.You can download it from below.

We'll be adding more features soon depending on the feedback from you . So please go forward and download the app and be better informed so as to BRING THE CHANGE YOU WISH TO SEE
